flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: SLAKOTH lolls around for over twentynhours every day. Because it moves sonlittle, it does not need much food.fThis POKéMON’s sole daily meal consistsnof just three leaves.
SLAKOTH’s heart beats just once anminute. Whatever happens, it isncontent to loaf around motionless.fIt is rare to see this POKéMON innmotion.
It sleeps virtually all day and night long.nIt doesn’t change its nest its entire life,nbut it sometimes travels great distancesnby swimming in rivers.
It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Makingndrowsy those that see it is one ofnits abilities.
It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Makingndrowsy those that see it is one ofnits abilities.
It spends nearly all its time in anday sprawled out. Just seeing itnmakes one drowsy.
It spends nearly all its time in anday sprawled out. Just seeing itnmakes one drowsy.
It spends nearly all its time in anday sprawled out. Just seeing itnmakes one drowsy.
The way SLAKOTH lolls around makesnanyone who watches it feel likendoing the same.
The way SLAKOTH lolls around makesnanyone who watches it feel likendoing the same.
Il passe le plus clair de son tempsnaffalé. Rien qu’à le voir, on anenvie de bâiller.
It spends nearly all its time in anday sprawled out. Just seeing itnmakes one drowsy.
Il passe le plus clair de son tempsnaffalé. Rien qu’à le voir, on anenvie de bâiller.
It spends nearly all its time in anday sprawled out. Just seeing itnmakes one drowsy.
If it eats just three leaves in a day,nit is satisfied. Other than that,nit sleeps for 20 hours a day.
If it eats just three leaves in a day,nit is satisfied. Other than that,nit sleeps for 20 hours a day.
ナマケロの　なまけた　ようすはnみている　ひとの　なまけごころをnぞんぶんに　しげきするのだ。
게을로의 게으른 모습은n보고 있는 사람의 게으른 마음을n충분히 자극한다.
Rien qu’à voir un Parecool, on n’a plus envie denbouger et on s’endort.
Allein bei Bummelz’ Anblick werden Gegner vonnTrägheit gepackt und schlummern alsbald ein.
Slakoth se pasa todo el día holgazaneando y solo connverlo a uno le entra mucha pereza.
Coloro che osservano Slakoth, perdono la voglia dinmuoversi e vengono colti da sonnolenza.
The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone whonwatches it feel like doing the same.
ナマケロの　怠けた　様子はn見ている　人の　怠け心をn存分に　刺激するのだ。
１にちに　はっぱを　３まいもnたべれば　まんぞくで　それいがいはn２０じかんも　ねむっている。
하루에 잎을 3장만n먹으면 만족하고 그 외에는n20시간이나 자고 있다.
Il dort 20 heures par jour et ne fait rien d’autre,nsi ce n’est manger trois ou quatre feuilles dansnla journée.
Solange es täglich drei Blätter zu essen bekommt,nist es zufrieden. Abgesehen davon schläft esn20 Stunden am Tag.
Si se come tres hojas al día, ya se queda satisfecho.nAparte de eso, se pasa durmiendo 20 horas al día.
Tre foglie al giorno bastano a saziarlo e dorme finona 20 ore.
If it eats just three leaves in a day, it is satisfied.nOther than that, it sleeps for 20 hours a day.
１日に　葉っぱを　３枚もn食べれば　満足で　それ以外はn２０時間も　眠っている。
１にち　２０じかん　いじょう　ねそべっている。nほとんど　からだを　うごかさないので　はっぱをn３まい　たべれば　１にちの　しょくじが　おわる。
하루에 20시간 이상 엎드려 누워 있다.n거의 몸을 움직이지 않아서 잎사귀를n3장 먹으면 하루 식사가 끝난다.
Parecool se prélasse plus de vingt heures par jour.nIl bouge tellement peu qu’il n’a presque pas besoin denmanger. Le repas quotidien de ce Pokémon n’est constituénque de trois feuilles.
Bummelz faulenzt zwanzig Stunden pro Tag. Da es sichnsehr wenig bewegt, braucht es auch nicht viel Nahrung.nSeine Tagesration besteht lediglich aus drei Blättern.
Slakoth se pasa más de veinte horas al día tumbado. Como senmueve tan poco, necesita muy poca comida. De hecho, lanúnica toma que hace al día la componen tan solo tres hojas.
Slakoth ciondola in ozio per oltre 20 ore al giorno. Poichénsi muove così poco, non ha bisogno di molto nutrimento.nL’unico pasto giornaliero di questo Pokémon consistenin tre foglie fresche.
Slakoth lolls around for over 20 hours every day. Because itnmoves so little, it does not need much food. This Pokémon’snsole daily meal consists of just three leaves.
１日　２０時間　以上　寝そべっている。nほとんど　体を　動かさないので　葉っぱをn３枚　食べれば　１日の　食事が　終わる。
しんぞうの　こどうは　１ぷんかんに　１かい。nとにかく　じっと　ねそべっている　ポケモンでnうごく　すがたを　みることは　ほとんど　ない。
심장의 고동이 1분에 1번 뛴다.n아무튼 가만히 누워 있는 포켓몬으로n움직이는 모습을 거의 볼 수가 없다.
Le cœur de Parecool ne bat qu’une fois par minute.nQuoi qu’il arrive, il se contente de s’avachir, immobile.nIl est très rare de voir ce Pokémon se déplacer.
Bummelz’ Herz schlägt nur ein Mal pro Minute. DiesesnPokémon ist damit zufrieden, bewegungslos herumzulungern.nNur ganz selten sieht man dieses Pokémon in Bewegung.
A Slakoth le late el corazón una vez por minuto. Ya puedenpasar lo que pase, que este Pokémon no mueve un dedo.nEstá todo el día holgazaneando. Es muy raro verlo ennmovimiento.
Il cuore di Slakoth batte con una frequenza di appenanun battito al minuto. Qualsiasi cosa accada, non si muove mai.nInfatti adora poltrire, riducendo al minimo i suoi movimenti.
Slakoth’s heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens,nit is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see thisnPokémon in motion.
心臓の　鼓動は　１分間に　１回。nとにかく　じっと　寝そべっている　ポケモンでn動く　姿を　見ることは　ほとんど　ない。
